SSHT should be used with caution. The Korean Ministry of Food and Drug Safety permits the use of SSHT, except in the following contraindications ( Table 1)
43 : patients receiving interferon; patients with liver cirrhosis and liver cancer (use of SSHT can lead to interstitial pneumonia, which can further cause serious consequences such as death); patients with platelet counts of less than 100,000/mm 3 owing to liver dysfunction.
